title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 8: Competition Modeling
goal: Rehearse race segments, pacing, and decision points; simulate regatta workflow.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: Model: (250 hard start + 1000 settle + 500 push + 250 sprint) as broken pieces
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: 2k simulations broken (e.g., 4x500m). Week 2: full 2k test or on-water TT if safe.
